action.content:
You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this grid and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your grid first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the grids to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short grid description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else. This is your grid:
X X X X X
X X X X ▢
X X X ▢ ▢
X X ▢ ▢ ▢
X ▢ ▢ ▢ ▢

DESCRIPTION: A 5x5 grid where each row from top to bottom has one fewer 'X' starting from the right, forming a diagonal line of 'X's from the top-right to the bottom-left. The remaining cells are empty (▢).

You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this grid and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your grid first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the grids to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short grid description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else. This is your grid:
X X X X X
▢ X X X X
▢ ▢ X X X
▢ ▢ ▢ X X
▢ ▢ ▢ ▢ X
DESCRIPTION: 5x5 grid with Xs on and above the main diagonal (top-left to bottom-right) and ▢s below.

This is my DESCRIPTION: A 5x5 grid where each row from top to bottom has one fewer 'X' starting from the right, forming a diagonal line of 'X's from the top-right to the bottom-left. The remaining cells are empty (▢).
Now ask a question in order to find out new aspects of my grid that may be different to your grid. Start with "QUESTION:" and do not add anything else.
QUESTION: In the bottom row, is the single 'X' located in the leftmost cell or the rightmost cell?

This is my DESCRIPTION: 5x5 grid with Xs on and above the main diagonal (top-left to bottom-right) and ▢s below.
QUESTION: In the bottom row, is the single 'X' located in the leftmost cell or the rightmost cell? Start your answer with "ANSWER:" and do not add anything else.
Now ask a question in order to find out new aspects of my grid that may be different to your grid. Start with "QUESTION:" and do not add anything else.
QUESTION: In the second row, is the leftmost cell an 'X' or a '▢'?

ANSWER: leftmost cell
